data.comment: Today's referee, Guido Winkmann, has blown to start the match.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Philipp Lienhart of Freiburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 5, Guido Winkmann signals a Dortmund throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Dortmund.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Dortmund.
Throw-in for Freiburg at Signal Iduna Park.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Dortmund.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Dortmund.
In the minute 15, In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guido Winkmann awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Freiburg.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Dortmund in the half of Freiburg.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Giovanni Reyna for Dortmund who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Giovanni Reyna is back on the pitch.
In the minute 22, Dortmund advance rapidly upfield but Guido Winkmann blows for offside.
Throw-in Freiburg.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 24, Freiburg needs to be cautious. Dortmund have an attacking throw-in.
Dortmund have a dangerous throw-in.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Dortmund Dortmund attack through Jude Bellingham. The finish is off target, however.
Guido Winkmann awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Dortmund to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 31, Goal! Erling Haaland gives Dortmund a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Giovanni Reyna to set up the goal.
Dortmund are coming forward and Giovanni Reyna gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guido Winkmann signals a Dortmund throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In the minute 36, Dortmund are pushing forward but Erling Haaland's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Freiburg at Signal Iduna Park.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Dortmund.
In the minute 38, Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Dortmund's Thomas Meunier is on target but unsuccessful.
Dortmund's Mats Hummels gets in a shot on goal at Signal Iduna Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Freiburg at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 40, Freiburg's Baptiste Santamaria gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dortmund defender.
Free kick Dortmund.
Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 45, Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Signal Iduna Park.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
In the minute 47, Dortmund move into a 2-0 lead through a Emre Can header.
Giovanni Reyna with an assist there.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Dortmund to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Throw-in Freiburg.
Can Dortmund capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
In the minute 49, Dortmund drives forward and Axel Witsel gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Dortmund.
Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Dortmund's Axel Witsel misses with an attempt on goal.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Dortmund.
In the minute 55, Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Freiburg just outside Dortmund's area.
Mats Hummels (Dortmund) has received a yellow card from Guido Winkmann.
In the minute 56, Jonathan Schmid (Freiburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
Woo-yeong Jeong is replacing Lucas Holer for the away team.
In the minute 56, Christian Streich is making the team's second substitution at Signal Iduna Park with Chang-Hoon Kwon replacing Nils Petersen.
Freiburg make their fourth substitution with Keven Schlotterbeck replacing Manuel Gulde.
Vincenzo Grifo is replacing Roland Sallai for Freiburg at Signal Iduna Park.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Chang-Hoon Kwon for Freiburg has been booked by Guido Winkmann and receives a first yellow card.
Guido Winkmann signals a Dortmund throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Freiburg are pushing forward but Nicolas Hofler's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Dortmund.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Guido Winkmann awards Freiburg a goal kick.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Dortmund take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Erling Haaland.
Giovanni Reyna instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Julian Brandt is on a sub for Marco Reus for Dortmund.
Lucien Favre (Dortmund) is making a first substitution, with Thomas Delaney replacing Jude Bellingham.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Freiburg.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
In the minute 74, Guido Winkmann signals a throw-in for Dortmund, close to Freiburg's area.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Dortmund's Erling Haaland misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, Guido Winkmann awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
The home team replace Giovanni Reyna with Reinier.
In the minute 82, Freiburg pushes forward through Vincenzo Grifo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Dortmund are coming forward and Julian Brandt gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 84, Felix Passlack is on a sub for Thomas Meunier for Dortmund.
The home team have replaced Raphael Guerreiro with Nico Schulz. This is the fourth substitution made today by Lucien Favre.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a fifth substitution, with Lukas Kubler replacing Jonathan Schmid.
In the minute 85, Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
Dortmund are in shooting range from this free kick.
Important block from the Freiburg defence as Julian Brandt fires in a strike for Dortmund.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick in a good position for Freiburg!
Guido Winkmann blows to end the match. The final score is 4-0.
Felix Passlack puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-0.
That's a fine assist from Erling Haaland.
